inputs.name: credentials
inputs.label: Credentials
inputs.helpMarkDown: The credentials to use to setup and push the tag.

inputs.name: repoId
inputs.label: Repository Identifier
inputs.helpMarkDown:
The URL part used to identify the Git Repo that the Tag will be pushed to. For example, `cloudpups/universal-git-tags`.
* **Please note** that some source control tools (e.g. Azure DevOps, GitLab) require this to be formatted a specific way.
* Check out the [systems document](https://github.com/cloudpups/universal-git-tags/blob/main/docs/VerifiedSystems.md) for more details.

inputs.name: commitHash
inputs.label: Commit Hash
inputs.helpMarkDown: The hash of the commit to tag, defaults to `$(Build.SourceVersion)`, fails if not set and `$(Build.SourceVersion)` is empty.

inputs.name: tagName
inputs.label: Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name of the tag (e.g. Dev, v1.0). Defaults to `$(Build.BuildNumber)`. Fails if empty.

inputs.name: tagMessage
inputs.label: Message
inputs.helpMarkDown: The message of the tag (e.g. Dev, v1.0). Defaults to `$(Build.BuildNumber)`. Fails if empty.

inputs.name: forcePush
inputs.label: Force Push
inputs.helpMarkDown: Setting this to true will cause this task to overwrite existing tags.

inputs.name: workingDirectory
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The directory that Universal Git Tags will run its commands. Defaults to `$(Build.ArtifactStagingDirectory)/universal-tagging-prep-currenttime` (where `currenttime` is [`Date.now()`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Date/now)) so as to not interfere with any existing git repositories.
